word: THE SPIRITUAL CONTEST IMMEDIATELY FOLLOWING A REVIVAL, WHICH RAGES BETWEEN THE FORCES OF RIGHTEOUSNESS AND THE FORCES OF EVIL FOR THE SOULS OF THOSE WHO HAVE BEGUN A NEW EXPERIENCE, IS VIVIDLY PORTRAYED IN THIS SECTION. IN THE SETTING OF THE GREAT REVIVAL AT BATTLE CREEK COLLEGE AND THE EVENTS THAT FOLLOWED IN SUCCEEDING MONTHS, ELLEN WHITE DEALS WITH THIS VITAL QUESTION. THE ELEMENTS OF THIS STRUGGLE ARE THOSE THAT ARE PRESENT IN EVERY REVIVAL EFFORT OF THE CHURCH.
